Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.playerReleted

Class Frontier

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.playerReleted.Frontier
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Frontier extends Object implements Serializable
Represents the frontier of a codex The frontier is the set of positions that are free and adjacent to a placement
